task.title: Install Eucalyptus from Nightly Packages
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to install Eucalyptus from nightly builds.

context.note: Eucalyptus nightly packages are latest Eucalyptus builds. They should be considered unstable/"bleeding edge" software and should not be installed in production. In addition, upgrades from nightlies to released software are not supported.
